properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
PIRACY.
TUG ATTACKED, FIVE PERSONS KIDNAPPED, VICINITY
04-12N 008-00E AT 180515Z SEP. VESSELS
ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION
AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
